GenotypeGraph

Class GenotypeNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • GenotypeGraph.GenotypeNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<GenotypeNode>

    public class GenotypeNode
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<GenotypeNode>
    A base class for a single node from a genotype graph
    Author:
    rossi INVARIANT: numberOfMutations = #count of true in genotype probability, emissionProbability , steadyStateProbability in [0,1]

      • add

        public void add(GenotypeNode other)
        Adds a node to the adjacency list of this node NOTE: there is no control on the meaning of the values of the genotype (eg. to which gene they are associated with)
        Parameters:
        other - a node REQUIRE not null, with compatible genotype

      • addParent

        protected void addParent(GenotypeNode other)

        Parameters:
        other - a node REQUIRE not null, with compatible genotype

      • compareGenotype

        private int compareGenotype(boolean[] other)
        Comparison of two genotypes A and B. A is considered bigger than B if the binary number it represents is bigger than that of B
        Parameters:
        other - B's genotype
        Returns:
        0 if A=B, 1 if A>B, -1 else

      • contains

        public boolean contains(GenotypeNode other)
        Checks if this node has a genotype containing one mutation more than the other node
        Parameters:
        other -
        Returns:
        true if this node has a genotype containing one mutation more than the other node, false otherwise

      • findParentFromId

        public int findParentFromId(int parId)
        Linear search among parents to find which one has parId id
        Parameters:
        parId - id to find
        Returns:
        position of parent in the adj list of this (-1 if not found)
